# 题目

实现一个 `wrap_string` 函数，遍历给定字符串中的每个单词，如果当前行的长度超过了 `text_width::Int=10`，那么在末尾单词前插入换行符。提供给一个例子

```julia
function wrap_string(text)
    # 初始化返回结果的数组
    lines = Vector{String}()
    current_line = ""
    text_width = 10

    for word in split(text)
        if length(current_line) + length(word) > text_width
            # 当前行已满，添加换行符和单词到结果中
            push!(lines, current_line * "\n" * word)
            current_line = word
        else
            # 将单词追加到当前行
            current_line += " " * word
        end
    end

    # 处理剩余的字符，如果存在的话
    if length(current_line) > 0
        push!(lines, current_line)
    end

    return join(lines, "\n")
end

# 例子
text = "Hello there, this is a very long sentence that should be wrapped at 10 characters per line."
println(wrap_string(text))
```

输出将会是：

```
Hello there,
this is a very
long sentence
that should be
wrapped at 10
characters per line.
```
